tool_description: Embarking on a journey to new destinations, exploring diverse cultures, and savoring unique experiences is what makes vacations so extraordinary. In this section, we delve into the world of travel and leisure, providing you with insights into some of the most captivating vacation destinations around the globe. name: Vacations details:Your Ultimate Guide
title: Vacations details:Your Ultimate Guide

api_list.name: get_all_countries
api_list.description: the method is used to retrieve information about all countries stored in the dictionary and returns the data in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vacation details
api_list.description: Embarking on a journey to new destinations, exploring diverse cultures, and savoring unique experiences is what makes vacations so extraordinary. In this section, we delve into the world of travel and leisure, providing you with insights into some of the most captivating vacation destinations around the globe. From iconic landmarks and natural wonders to cultural gems and culinary delights, we're here to help you plan your dream getaway. So, let's embark on a virtual voyage and uncover the vacation secrets that will inspire your next adventure.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries/Lebanon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries/{country_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vacations-details-your-ultimate-guide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
